[{"id":"dev-16867","entityId":"86-21634","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Booking Page] Notice and link in Booking detail page when order includes several bookings"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Walid Dechri"},{"name":"created","value":"1570542109301"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"16867"},{"name":"description","value":"

Actual result:

If you book a bundle or an offer + Addons, the system will display in booking overview of different links according to the ticket.
After going to the booking details page, there is no possibility to see the whole order in once.
you need to go back to booking overview and then edit the 2nd booking


Expected result:

1- Add Notice + link in booking details page which link to the other bookings

  • If Order contain another bookings or merchandise items
    In addition to this booking (booking number), the following bookings were also made.
    +Amount of ticket x Product name+ >>>>> After clicking, redirect supplier to the 2nd booking detail page (ticket booking) or addons details page (merchandise booking)

Click dummy : https://marvelapp.com/4h2hhje/screen/62276770

Copy:

EN: This booking also contains:
DE: Diese Buchung enthält außerdem:
FR: Cette réservation comprend également:

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1574181015301,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-15988","entityId":"86-18319","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Bundle] Add Gift certificate module for Bundle"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Walid Dechri"},{"name":"created","value":"1543843645434"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"15988"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://regiondo-demo-account-muenchen.regiondo.fr/packs-promo
Product ID56647
Account emaildemoaccount@regiondo.de
Supplier ID9357
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Step to reproduce:

1- Go to Dashboard » Manage Offers » My Offer Bundles
2- Preview offer ID 56647

Actual result:

We can't buy gift certificate for bundle activities

Expected result:

  • FRONT END

1- Add Gift voucher module to bundle offers

1- A : 1 gift certificate code should be valid of all bundle activities.

1- B :Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :

  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people

2- After buying gift voucher for bundle offer, Customer should be able to redeem his voucher in the normal redeeming link and in POS

2- A : Redeeming voucher template, should propose
Font end :
Back end :

2- B- Show Custom order option if the Redeeming voucher template if bundle offer require one

2- C : if there is no availabilities , show supplier information (Company name , phone , Email address)

Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact %s company name :
%s phone
%s Email address

Wording
EN : Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact the supplier
FR : Malheureusement il n'y a pas de rendez-vous disponible, nous vous invitons de contacter le prestataire
DE : Leider ist kein Termin verfügbar, wir laden Sie ein, sich mit dem anbieter in Verbindung zu setzen:

  • POS

3- Ability to buy Gift voucher in POS

3- A- Display bundle Offer when we select Gift certificate

3- B - Same logic as in Front- end should be applied in POS

  • 1 code valid for all bundle activities.
  • Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :
  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people
  1. Availability of bundle voucher should be taken from Dashboard » Manage Offers » Ticket validity
